Posts.Content: And for NMIBC. The only 2 patients who received one single high dose instillation of TLD-1433 and Optimized treatment procedure are still cancer free after at least 9 months. One had CIS and the other HG both had failed multiple rounds of BCG. New Gold Standard in the making for CIS NMIBC. PH2 starting within days weeks in Canada and between March and May in the US and EU. https://finance.yahoo.com/news/patient-six-cancer-free-nine-120000776.html
Posts.Title: New cancer breakthroughs
